thread.section_title: Chewy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chewy.com | chewy.com
thread.title: Michelle DeFabis

author: Michelle DeFabis
title: Michelle DeFabis
text: My dog Rocky has a lot of health problems from itching, to a grain allergy, to teeth issues... Anything I need for him, chewy.com has. They also have an auto ship option but I choose not to use it because sometimes the food comes too quickly or not soon enough but when I order something it comes within two days, and they have options for pretty much any filter you're looking for when u search stuff on the website and most of their food is cheaper than if you buy it in pet smart or petco.
